# JRaviLab {.unnumbered}

This is a short book (built with [Quarto](https://quarto.org/docs/books)) compiled to guide, onboard, and offboard JRaviLab members at the University of Colorado Anschutz Medical Campus.

### Acknowledgments

We appreciate and build upon awesome onboarding group resources from Arjun Krishnan, Fan Zhang, Annika Barber, Christoph Rau, and several others.
